attributes.action: Do not let failed asylum seekers gain access to free NHS treatment while waiting to be deported.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The decision to allow failed immigrants access to the NHS is understandable but not on an already drained hospital system suffering from a lack of funding. 
With many immigrants already overcrowding the clogged hospital waiting lists and overflowing general practices, this seems to be an impossible idea.
